scripts.update-stack: aws --region $npm_package_config_region cloudformation update-stack --stack-name $npm_package_config_name --template-url $npm_package_config_template_url --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ApiUrlParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_api_url ParameterKey=ChunkSizeParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_chunk_size ParameterKey=S3BucketParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_name ParameterKey=S3BucketParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_name && aws --region $npm_package_config_region cloudformation wait stack-update-complete --stack-name $npm_package_config_name
scripts.create-stack: aws --region $npm_package_config_region cloudformation create-stack --stack-name $npm_package_config_name --template-url $npm_package_config_template_url --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --parameters ParameterKey=ApiUrlParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_api_url ParameterKey=ChunkSizeParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_chunk_size ParameterKey=S3BucketParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_name ParameterKey=S3BucketParameter,ParameterValue=$npm_package_config_name && aws --region $npm_package_config_region cloudformation wait stack-create-complete --stack-name $npm_package_config_name
scripts.upload-deploy: zip -r deploy.zip checkProbe.js checkAcquire.js node_modules && aws --region $npm_package_config_region s3 cp deploy.zip s3://$npm_package_config_name/deploy.zip
scripts.create: npm run upload-deploy && npm run upload-template && npm run create-stack
scripts.update: npm run upload-template && npm run update-stack
scripts.update-code: npm run upload-deploy && aws --region $npm_package_config_region lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-probe-check-acquire --s3-bucket $npm_package_config_name --s3-key deploy.zip && aws --region $npm_package_config_region lambda update-function-code --function-name urlcheck-probe-check-probe --s3-bucket $npm_package_config_name --s3-key deploy.zip
scripts.delete: aws --region $npm_package_config_region cloudformation delete-stack --stack-name $npm_package_config_name && aws --region $npm_package_config_region cloudformation wait stack-delete-complete --stack-name $npm_package_config_name
